summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Ninth Avenue Northeast from East Sixty-third Street to East Sixty-fifth Street and East Sixty-fourth Street, from Eighth Avenue Northeast to Tenth Avenue North east, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 47067 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
